name: Slow-Cooker Apple Spice Cobbler Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: apple pie filling, spice cake mix, butter, vanilla ice cream
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine the Apple Pie filling, cake mix, and butter in the slow cooker
Bake on High for 2 to 2.5 hours
Server a la mode with vanilla ice cream or your favorite whipped cream.
